trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gere uma colecção de interface de utilizador relacionadas com <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Each Adorner can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: Cada ao elemento complementar pode ser ativado e desativado.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled Adorner objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Apenas objetos ao elemento complementar ativados irão receber mensagens de teste e paint acessos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: An Adorner can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Ao elemento complementar que pode ser visualizado como um proxy entre o interface de utilizador elementos relacionados, que consistem em todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objetos e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral do serviço de comportamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Adorner constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: O construtor ao elemento complementar cria uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>e está ativada por predefinição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, a coleção define esta propriedade para que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>pode chamar novamente para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um se com indicação de valor de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> está ativada.

trans-unit.source: If the Enabled property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade Enabled `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>classe enviará `HitTest` e `Paint` mensagens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> está ativada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Força o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> para atualizar a respetiva janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Força o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> para atualizar a respetiva janela ao elemento complementar dentro de determinada <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Área para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Força o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> para atualizar a respetiva janela ao elemento complementar dentro de determinada <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> para invalidar.
